Keep the community informed with instant notifications. Schools can send messages about closings, delays, event cancelations, and more.
Give people a place to view all of your events. Users can receive notifications about events and categories by subscribing to them.

Schools - provide a single stop for all your district athletic info. Show rosters, schedules, scores, and notices. Users can subscribe to a team to be notified about upcoming games and schedule changes.
Show all the latest news and photos in a single stream. Stories can be automatically pulled from your Facebook page or website, or be added directly to the app.
All app content is managed through an easy to use dashboard. Administrators can add new users and control what they have access to.
Any additional resources or features you need can be included in the app.
